#7Change
bills123<- function(){
  bills <- c(50,100,200,500,1000)

pricesnako <- as.numeric(readline(prompt = "Enter of Price:"))
if(is.na(pricesnako) || pricesnako %% 50 !=0){
  cat("Invalid input\n")
  return()
}
pricesnack <- pricesnako

 bill50 <- 0
 bill100 <- 0
 bill200 <- 0
 bill500 <- 0
 bill1000 <- 0
 
 if(pricesnack>=50){
   bill50 <- pricesnack %% 50
 }if(pricesnack>=100){
  bill100 <- pricesnack %% 100
   pricesnack <- pricesnack %% 100
 }if(pricesnack>=200){
   bill200 <- pricesnack %% 200
   pricesnack <- pricesnack %% 200
 }if(pricesnack>=500){
   bill500 <- pricesnack %% 500
   pricesnack <- pricesnack %% 500
 }if(pricesnack>=1000){
    bill1000 <- pricesnack %% 1000
    pricesnack <- pricesnack %% 1000
 }
 cat("The Price is:\n",pricesnako)
 cat("Minimum Bills needed\n")
 cat("50 pesos:",bill50,"\n")
 cat("100 pesos:",bill100,"\n")
 cat("200 pesos:",bill200,"\n")
 cat("500 pesos:",bill500,"\n")
 cat("1000 pesos:",bill1000,"\n")
} 
bills123()
